Description The clock ticks again with 24: LEGACY, the next evolution of the groundbreaking and award-winning drama franchise, 24. 24: LEGACY chronicles an adrenaline-fueled race against the clock to stop a devastating terrorist attack on United States soil â€“ in the same real-time format that has propelled this genre-defining series.
